user_system package¶

Subpackages¶

user_system.forms module¶

class user_system.forms.Publicate(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]¶

Bases: Form

Publicate is a form that allows the user to publicate a new entry. It has a single field, the title of the entry.

Form fields:

  • title: Title (CharField)

property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class user_system.forms.UserConfig(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]¶

Bases: ModelForm

UserConfig is a form that allows the user to change its personal data. It has the following fields:

  • image: the user’s image

  • first_name: the user’s name

  • last_name: the user’s surname

  • website: the user’s website

  • email: the user’s email

  • biography: the user’s biography

Form fields:

  • image: Image (ImageField)

  • first_name: First name (CharField)

  • last_name: Last name (CharField)

  • email: Email address (EmailField)

  • website: Website (CharField)

  • biography: Biography (CharField)

property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class user_system.forms.UserConfigPassword(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]¶

Bases: Form

UserConfigPassword is a form that allows the user to change its password. It has the following fields:

  • password: the user’s new password

  • password_confirm: the user’s new password confirmation

Form fields:

  • password: Password (CharField)

  • password_confirm: Password Confirm (CharField)

property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class user_system.forms.UserConfigPrivateData(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]¶

Bases: ModelForm

UserConfigPrivateData is a form that allows the user to change its private data. 3 fields are included:

  • gender

  • country

  • language

Form fields:

  • gender: Gender (CharField)

  • country: Country (CharField)

  • language: Language (CharField)

property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

user_system.models module¶

class user_system.models.UserPersonalized(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: AbstractUser

Class:

‘UserPersonalized’ is a class that extends the AbstractUser class.

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • password (CharField) – Password

  • last_login (DateTimeField) – Last login

  • is_superuser (BooleanField) – Superuser status. Designates that this user has all permissions without explicitly assigning them.

  • username (CharField) – Username. Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

  • first_name (CharField) – First name

  • last_name (CharField) – Last name

  • email (EmailField) – Email address

  • is_staff (BooleanField) – Staff status. Designates whether the user can log into this admin site.

  • is_active (BooleanField) – Active. Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Unselect this instead of deleting accounts.

  • date_joined (DateTimeField) – Date joined

  • biography (TextField) – Biography

  • image (ImageField) – Image

  • website (TextField) – Website

  • gender (CharField) – Gender

  • country (CharField) – Country

  • language (CharField) – Language

Relationship fields:

Parameters:

  • groups (ManyToManyField to Group) – Groups. The groups this user belongs to. A user will get all permissions granted to each of their groups. (related name: user_set)

  • user_permissions (ManyToManyField to Permission) – User permissions. Specific permissions for this user. (related name: user_set)

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

  • logentry (Reverse ForeignKey from LogEntry) – All log entries of this user (related name of user)

  • publications (Reverse ForeignKey from Publication) – All publications of this user (related name of publisher)

  • checks (Reverse ManyToManyField from Publication) – All checks of this user (related name of checks)

  • rates (Reverse ManyToManyField from Publication) – All rates of this user (related name of rates)

  • rate (Reverse ForeignKey from Rate) – All rates of this user (related name of user)

  • blockauthors (Reverse ManyToManyField from BlockAuthors) – All block authorss of this user (related name of authors)

user_system.models.user_directory_path(instance, filename)[source]¶

user_directory_path: This function is used to upload the image of the user to the correct folder. :param instance: The instance of the model. :type instance: UserPersonalized :param filename: The name of the file. :type filename: str
